name: Ultimate Portfolio, Photo gallery & Slider
author: A WP Life

sections.description:
Ultimate Portfolio is a versatile WordPress plugin for creating captivating galleries, post, projects and showcases using the Gutenberg editor. Experience the live editing and quick settings With multiple layouts, cuztomizable skins, and dynamic content.

Ultimate Portfolio

Explore the live demo – Click Here

🌟 Gutenberg GALLERY BUILDER

Ultimate Portfolio Builder is a powerful WordPress plugin that empowers you to create stunning galleries and showcases with ease. Utilize the Gutenberg editor to design visually appealing galleries that enhance your website’s visual content.

🎨 Multiple Layouts

Choose from a wide range of gallery layouts to suit your website’s aesthetic and functional requirements. Whether you prefer grids, masonry, or carousels, Gutenberg Gallery Builder has you covered.

Layout Options:

Masonry – Demo
Grid – Demo
Slider – Demo
Justified – (Premium) Demo

🎉 Multiple Skins

Customize the appearance of your galleries effortlessly with multiple skins and styles. Tailor your galleries to match your website’s theme and create a seamless visual experience. Also it can be easeily custumizable with extra CSS.

Skin Options:

Classic
standard
Wave
Tilt (Premium)

🖼️ Gallery & Post Fetching Options

Ultimate Portfolio offers flexible options for populating your galleries. Fetch images from your media library, specific posts, or even external sources to create dynamic and engaging content.

🔍 Filter Drag & Drop, Sorting Controls

Take control of your gallery content organization with drag-and-drop filtering and sorting controls. Easily rearrange items, apply filters, and create a tailored user experience for your audience.

🌟 Enhance your Ultimate Portfolio with Premium Features:

  • Social Media Fetching: Ultimate Portfolio can fetch social media feeds and display them beautifully on your site. Supported platforms include: YouTube, Instagram, Flickr, Vimeo, Unsplash.
  • Video Integration: Seamlessly integrate videos into your galleries for an immersive experience.
  • Advanced Styling: Unlock advanced styling options to further customize the look and feel of your galleries.
  • Priority Support: Get priority customer support with our premium package.

Supported platforms include:

YouTube
Instagram
Flickr
Vimeo
Unsplash

Video Integration: Seamlessly integrate videos into your galleries for an immersive experience.

Advanced Styling: Unlock advanced styling options to further customize the look and feel of your galleries.

Priority Support: Get priority customer support with our premium package.

1.0.0
